If you take tamoxifen, you should have a pelvic examination every year to look for any signs of cancer. A woman should report any vaginal bleeding, other than menstrual bleeding, to her doctor as soon as possible.",NIHSeniorHealth,Breast Cancer
What are the treatments for Breast Cancer ?,"Certain drugs that have been used successfully in other cancers are now being used to treat some breast cancers.
